star_rules_1: 1. The star list is sorted according to the number of diamonds converted from gifts received by users;
star_rules_2: 2. The rich list is sorted according to the number of gold coins corresponding to the gifts given by users;
star_rules_3: 3. The awards obtained from the activity will be sent to the winners within 24 hours after the end of the activity;
star_rules_4: 4. After the event, the winning users will be publicized for 1 day;
